svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - October 12 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 12, 2024" date: "2024-10-11"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
â€¢ Eth R&D protocol call focused on execution layer (ACDE #198): Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-3 :
issues being found & fixed Pectra-devnet-4 : plan to launch next week EIP2537 BLS precompile :
breakout to finalize gas pricing & specs Public testnet : launch by Devcon Proposed EIPs: EIP7783
gradually increase gas limit : can implement without an upgrade EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8 seconds
: alternative to raising blob count EIP4444 : Nethermind continuing Portal network integration
â€¢ Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-3 : issues being found & fixed Pectra-devnet-4 : plan to launch next
week EIP2537 BLS precompile : breakout to finalize gas pricing & specs Public testnet : launch by
Devcon
Pectra upgrade:
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-3 : issues being found & fixed
Pectra-devnet-3 : issues being found & fixed
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-4 : plan to launch next week
Pectra-devnet-4 : plan to launch next week
â€¢ EIP2537 BLS precompile : breakout to finalize gas pricing & specs
EIP2537 BLS precompile : breakout to finalize gas pricing & specs
â€¢ Public testnet : launch by Devcon
Public testnet : launch by Devcon
â€¢ Proposed EIPs: EIP7783 gradually increase gas limit : can implement without an upgrade EIP7782
reduce slot time to 8 seconds : alternative to raising blob count
Proposed EIPs:
â€¢ EIP7783 gradually increase gas limit : can implement without an upgrade
EIP7783 gradually increase gas limit : can implement without an upgrade
â€¢ EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8 seconds : alternative to raising blob count
EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8 seconds : alternative to raising blob count
â€¢ EIP4444 : Nethermind continuing Portal network integration
EIP4444 : Nethermind continuing Portal network integration
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
â€¢ Base blob increase proposal : recommends target of 5 & max of 8 blobs (up from 3/6), implementing
engine_getBlobsV1 & IDONTWANT and disabling flood publishing
Base blob increase proposal : recommends target of 5 & max of 8 blobs (up from 3/6), implementing
â€¢ Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.8 : pectra-devnet-4 target
Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.8 : pectra-devnet-4 target
â€¢ Weekly testing call #8
Weekly testing call #8
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
â€¢ Peerdas-devnet-3 : launched with peerdas-devnet-2 spec, issue caused clients to be on different
forks
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , moving away from 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , moving away from 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 36% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Vitalik: surgical EVM scaling , EVMMAX + SIMD and reduce some opcode gas costs
Vitalik: surgical EVM scaling , EVMMAX + SIMD and reduce some opcode gas costs
â€¢ EIP7732 ePBS: ePBS breakout #11 : Prysm aim to launch devnet in 2 weeks
EIP7732 ePBS:
â€¢ ePBS breakout #11 : Prysm aim to launch devnet in 2 weeks
Research
â€¢ Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL): Terence: transaction invalidation in FOCIL & impact on
block producers/verifiers Uncrowdability of FOCIL : outsourcing inclusion list construction rights is
not individually profitable
Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL):
â€¢ Terence: transaction invalidation in FOCIL & impact on block producers/verifiers
Terence: transaction invalidation in FOCIL & impact on block producers/verifiers
â€¢ Uncrowdability of FOCIL : outsourcing inclusion list construction rights is not individually
profitable
Uncrowdability of FOCIL : outsourcing inclusion list construction rights is not individually
â€¢ Silent threshold encryption combined with ZK or TEEs to remove MEV-Boost relays
Silent threshold encryption combined with ZK or TEEs to remove MEV-Boost relays
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Teku v24.10.0 : adds engine_getBlobsV1 & IDONTWANT support and disabled flood
publishing; v24.10.1 : hotfix for validators proposer config that prevented startup in v24.10.0
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Teku v24.10.0 : adds engine_getBlobsV1 & IDONTWANT support and disabled flood publishing; v24.10.1 :
hotfix for validators proposer config that prevented startup in v24.10.0
â€¢ Execution layer: Nethermind v1.29.0 : adds heuristics-based censorship detection for high-paying
transactions & addresses Reth v1.1.0 : Engine 2.0 enabled by default (except op-reth), new metrics &
RPC improvements
Execution layer:
â€¢ Nethermind v1.29.0 : adds heuristics-based censorship detection for high-paying transactions &
addresses
Nethermind v1.29.0 : adds heuristics-based censorship detection for high-paying transactions &
â€¢ Reth v1.1.0 : Engine 2.0 enabled by default (except op-reth), new metrics & RPC improvements
Reth v1.1.0 : Engine 2.0 enabled by default (except op-reth), new metrics & RPC improvements
Layer 2
â€¢ Flashbots Rollup-Boost : block building using TEEs, starting with 250ms Flashblocks (partial blocks)
and priority ordering
Flashbots Rollup-Boost : block building using TEEs, starting with 250ms Flashblocks (partial blocks)
â€¢ L2 standards meeting (RollCall #8): RIP7755 cross-L2 calls presentation, Pectra upgrade expected Q1
2025 (optimistically February) & upcoming breakout on future of EVM on L2
L2 standards meeting (RollCall #8): RIP7755 cross-L2 calls presentation, Pectra upgrade expected Q1
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7782 : Reduce slot time for lower peak bandwidth EIP7783 :
Add controlled gas limit increase strategy EIP7784 : GETCONTRACT opcode
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
â€¢ EIP7782 : Reduce slot time for lower peak bandwidth
EIP7782 : Reduce slot time for lower peak bandwidth
â€¢ EIP7783 : Add controlled gas limit increase strategy
EIP7783 : Add controlled gas limit increase strategy
â€¢ EIP7784 : GETCONTRACT opcode
EIP7784 : GETCONTRACT opcode
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7785 : Onchain registration of chain identifiers
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7785 : Onchain registration of chain identifiers
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Solidity v0.8.28 : adds transient storage state variables for value types, generates JSON for Yul
ASTs on demand to reduce memory usage and adds ability to request bytecode/IR for subset of contracts
Solidity v0.8.28 : adds transient storage state variables for value types, generates JSON for Yul ASTs
on demand to reduce memory usage and adds ability to request bytecode/IR for subset of contracts
â€¢ RareSkills: storage slots for dynamic types in Solidity (mappings, arrays, strings & bytes)
RareSkills: storage slots for dynamic types in Solidity (mappings, arrays, strings & bytes)
â€¢ Circom v2.2.0 : adds buses (groups related signals under one name)
Circom v2.2.0 : adds buses (groups related signals under one name)
â€¢ Circuitscan : submit/browse verified Circom circuits
Circuitscan : submit/browse verified Circom circuits
Security
â€¢ EigenLayer $6M stolen via compromised investor email thread, token vesting not enforced onchain but
via legal documents
Ecosystem
â€¢ Ethereum Foundation EcoDev research fellowships (6 months), deadline November 15
Ethereum Foundation EcoDev research fellowships (6 months), deadline November 15
â€¢ Hackathon projects: Ethereum Kuala Lumpur & ETHRome
Hackathon projects: Ethereum Kuala Lumpur & ETHRome
Enterprise
â€¢ Stripe Pay with Crypto : US businesses can accept USDC on mainnet, settled in USD
Job Listings
â€¢ Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
â€¢ Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
â€¢ Nethermind InfoSec Head , Sr Dev , SRE Lead , Sr Embedded Dev & UX UI designer
Nethermind InfoSec Head , Sr Dev , SRE Lead , Sr Embedded Dev & UX UI designer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 1.9 to 129.9 gwei, 15.1 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3
gwei 7k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 1.9 to 129.9 gwei, 15.1 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
Gas: 1.9 to 129.9 gwei, 15.1 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
â€¢ 7k ETH net issuance this week
7k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,346 - $2,504, currently $2,440, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,346 - $2,504, currently $2,440, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ ZKP2P Tickets : lower fee secondary market for Ticketmaster, zk proof of transfer
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ SEC: Crypto.com received Wells notice Cumberland DRW charged for allegedly operating as an
unregistered dealer
SEC:
â€¢ Crypto.com received Wells notice
Crypto.com received Wells notice
â€¢ Cumberland DRW charged for allegedly operating as an unregistered dealer
Cumberland DRW charged for allegedly operating as an unregistered dealer
â€¢ FTX bankruptcy plan approved , customers to receive cash for 118% on average of holdings value at
the time of bankruptcy
FTX bankruptcy plan approved , customers to receive cash for 118% on average of holdings value at the
time of bankruptcy
â€¢ FBI charge projects & market makers for market manipulation & wash trading, NexF token created on
mainnet as part of investigation
FBI charge projects & market makers for market manipulation & wash trading, NexF token created on
General
â€¢ TD Bank plead guilty to US Bank Secrecy Act & money laundering conspiracy violations, $1.8B in
penalties, no individuals charged
TD Bank plead guilty to US Bank Secrecy Act & money laundering conspiracy violations, $1.8B in
â€¢ US broadband attack linked to China, may have had access to wiretap infrastructure
US broadband attack linked to China, may have had access to wiretap infrastructure
â€¢ Internet Archive Wayback Machine offline after DDoS attack & data breach
Internet Archive Wayback Machine offline after DDoS attack & data breach
â€¢ WHIR : IOP of proximity for constrained Reed-Solomon codes, verifier runs in hundreds of
microseconds
WHIR : IOP of proximity for constrained Reed-Solomon codes, verifier runs in hundreds of microseconds
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-october-12-2024

(new/changes in bold )
â€¢ Oct 16 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 22 , OSS application deadline
Oct 16 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 22 , OSS application deadline

Oct 17-19 â€“ ETHSofia conference & hackathon

Oct 18-20 â€“ ETHGlobal San Francisco hackathon
â€¢ Oct 25-27 â€“ ETHSydney hackathon
Oct 25-27 â€“ ETHSydney hackathon
â€¢ Nov 12-15 â€“ Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
Nov 12-15 â€“ Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
â€¢ Nov 15-17 â€“ ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
Nov 15-17 â€“ ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
â€¢ Dec 6-8 â€“ ETHIndia hackathon
